import React from 'react' const NewsItems =()=>{ let {title , description ,imgUrl, newsUrl,date ,author, source} = props; return (
{source.name}
{title}...

{description}...

By {!author?"Unknown": author} on: {new Date(date).toGMTString()}

This app developed by Abideen

Read More
) } export default NewsItems
